00088    {  return true; }

00091    {  return false; }

00093    // Inline non-static methods
00094 
00095    /*
00096    * Write one object.
00097    */
00098    template <typename T>
00099    inline TextFileOArchive& TextFileOArchive::operator & (T& data)
00100    {   
00101       serialize(*this, data, version_); 
00102       return *this;
00103    }
00104 
00105    /*
00106    * Write one object.
00107    */
00108    template <typename T>
00109    inline TextFileOArchive& TextFileOArchive::operator << (T& data)
00110    {   
00111       serialize(*this, data, version_); 
00112       return *this;
00113    }

00115    // Method templates
00116 
00117    /*
00118    * Pack a single object of type T.
00119    */
00120    template <typename T>
00121    inline void TextFileOArchive::pack(const T& data)
00122    {  *ostreamPtr_ << data << std::endl; }
00123 
00124    /*
00125    * Bitwise pack a single object of type double.
00126    */
00127    template <>
00128    inline void TextFileOArchive::pack(const double& data)
00129    {  
00130       ostreamPtr_->setf(std::ios::scientific);
00131       ostreamPtr_->width(25);
00132       ostreamPtr_->precision(17);
00133       *ostreamPtr_ << data << std::endl; 
00134    }
00135 
00136    /*
00137    * Write a C-array of objects of type T.
00138    */
00139    template <typename T>
00140    inline void TextFileOArchive::pack(const T* array, int n)
00141    {
00142       for (int i=0; i < n; ++i) {
00143         *ostreamPtr_ << array[i] << "  ";
00144       }
00145       *ostreamPtr_ << std::endl;
00146    }
00147

00154    inline void serialize(TextFileOArchive& ar, bool& data, 
00155                          const unsigned int version)
00156    {  ar.pack(data); }

00237    template <>
00238    inline void serialize(TextFileOArchive& ar, std::string& data, 
00239                          const unsigned int version)
00240    {
00241       int size = data.size();
00242       ar.pack(size);
00243       ar.pack(data);
00244    }
